comment.author: 83025347@N00
comment._content: I'd heard of this kind of operation but have never seen photos of it before. Amazing how they could shoehorn this into a rail car.

comment._content: Photo inscribed with date: 7-17-1913. Great Northern Railway. Photo by Brown Photo Co., St. Paul, Minnesota.
